title: Rainy city driving, almost stopped at intersection
caption: Red car driving slowly in the rain on a busy city street with other cars and pedestrians.

reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving slowly in the rain to maintain visibility and avoid any potential accidents. The presence of pedestrians and other vehicles on the road requires the driver to be extra vigilant and attentive to their surroundings.
